Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
org.ziqi.Utils
public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for the facilitate other operation of the program, containing reusable and stateless helper methods and fields.
Author:
Ziqi Yang

  • Method Details

    • translatePoint

      public static java.awt.Point translatePoint​(java.awt.Point sourceLocation, java.awt.Point delta)
      Returns the new translated location by translating given point location by given delta vector.
      Parameters:
      sourceLocation - Original location as Point object.
      delta - Delta vector to translate from the original location as Point object.
      Returns:
      A new location after translation as Point is returned without modifying the original source.
      See Also:
      Point

    • getFullFileName

      public static java.lang.String getFullFileName​(java.lang.String fullName, java.lang.String extension)
      Gets a formatted file name as string by combining the given filename and its extension to return.
      Parameters:
      fullName - A string specifying the file name.
      extension - A string specifying the file extension.
      Returns:
      A full file name with slash and extension as string is returned to be used as path.

    • getResourcePath

      public static java.lang.String getResourcePath​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Gets the absolute file path as string by given file name string.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - A string specifying the file name with its extension in the resource folder.
      Returns:
      An absolute file path by given file name is returned.

    • getResourceURL

      public static java.net.URL getResourceURL​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Gets the file path as URL by given file name string.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - A string specifying the file name with its extension in the resource folder.
      Returns:
      A file path as URL by given file name is returned.
      See Also:
      URL

    • getResourcePathAsStream

      public static java.io.InputStream getResourcePathAsStream​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Gets the file path as InputStream by given file name string.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - A string specifying the file name with its extension in the resource folder.
      Returns:
      A file path as InputStream by given file name is returned.
      See Also:
      InputStream

    • getTimeString

      public static java.lang.String getTimeString​(long secondElapsed)
      Transforms from given long integer second into formatted time string.
      Parameters:
      secondElapsed - A long integer specifying the second time elapsed to be transformed.
      Returns:
      A formatted string as ""%02d:%02d" specifying time is returned.
      See Also:
      String.format(String, Object...)
